text: Petar Tsvetanov (born 30 August 1968) is a retired Bulgarian football defender.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian footballers Category:PFC CSKA Sofia players Category:FC Haskovo players Category:PFC Slavia Sofia players Category:Akratitos F.C. players Category:Thrasyvoulos F.C. players Category:Association football defenders Category:Bulgarian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Greece Category:Bulgarian expatriate sportspeople in Greece
